description:
runtime: add a hook to disable precise GC

This will let us ask people to rebuild the Go system without
precise GC, and then rebuild and retest their program, to see
if precise GC is causing whatever problem they are having.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=952b0c31c7f1 ***

runtime: add a hook to disable precise GC

This will let us ask people to rebuild the Go system without
precise GC, and then rebuild and retest their program, to see
if precise GC is causing whatever problem they are having.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/8700043

subject: code review 8700043: runtime: add a hook to disable precise GC
